SEARCH
Package functional.utilities

Class FileUtilities

java.lang.Object
functional.genericKeywords.ThreadLocalFunctionalities
functional.genericKeywords.GenericKeywords
functional.utilities.FileUtilities
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericKeywordsInterface
public class FileUtilities extends GenericKeywords
Utility class for handling file operations such as renaming and deleting files. Extends the GenericKeywords class for additional utility functionalities.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • FileUtilities

      public FileUtilities()

  • Method Details

    • renameFile

      public void renameFile(String sourceFilePath, String destinationFilePath, String currentFileName, String currentFileExtension, String renameFileName, String renameFileExtension)
      Renames a file from one name and extension to another.
      Parameters:
      sourceFilePath - The path of the file to be renamed.
      destinationFilePath - The destination path for the renamed file.
      currentFileName - The current name of the file (without extension).
      currentFileExtension - The current file extension.
      renameFileName - The new name for the file (without extension).
      renameFileExtension - The new file extension.

    • deleteFile

      public boolean deleteFile(String filePath, String fileName)
      Deletes a file from a specified path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path where the file is located.
      fileName - The name of the file to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the file is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getFile

      public File getFile(String filePath, String fileName)
      Retrieves a File object for a specific file located in a given path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path where the file is located.
      fileName - The name of the file to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The File object representing the specified file.

    • getFiles

      public File[] getFiles(String filePath)
      Retrieves an array of File objects from a specified directory.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the directory from which to list the files.
      Returns:
      An array of File objects from the specified directory.
